Package com.codingchili.core.context

Class CoreException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.codingchili.core.context.CoreException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CoreExceptionFormat, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockNotConfiguredException, ConfigurationMismatchException, FileMissingException, HashMismatchException, NodeFailedToAcknowledge, NodeNotReachableException, NoServicesConfiguredForBlock, NoSuchCommandException, NothingToRemoveException, NothingToUpdateException, RemoteBlockNotConfiguredException, RequestPayloadSizeException, RequestTimedOutException, RequestValidationException, StorageFailureException, UnmappedException, ValueAlreadyPresentException, ValueMissingException
    public class CoreException
extends java.lang.Exception
implements CoreExceptionFormat
    Exceptions should extend this class to allow for catching all core-type exceptions. Additionally, all classes extending CoreException must be safe to be forwarded to clients.
    See Also:
